predicate.note: Frames file for 'reassign' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. Verbnet entry 13.3, other framed members include allocate, award, concede, grant, promise and vote. Comparison to those. No Framenet entry.

roleset.name: give, associate with again

example.name: just transitive
example.text: Fluor Daniel already has reassigned most of its work crew, the sources said.

roleset.note: Reassign seems to not take Arg2 most of the time, while assign does. How odd.
